bill_title: to revise the reduction in state aid to special education based upon a school district's ending special education fund balance.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the reduction in state aid to special education based upon a school district's ending special education fund balance. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-37-44 be amended to read as follows: 13-37-44. A school district's state aid for special education shall be reduced by the amount which its ending special education fund balance exceeds twenty thirty percent of its special education expenditures for the prior fiscal year. Section 2. That section 3 of chapter 108 of the 1996 Session Laws be repealed. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
